paper_metadata.title: Gastric emptying in hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis: the impact of autonomic neuropathy
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information related to the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Swedish FAP patients, predominantly Val30Met carriers

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Gastric emptying scintigraphy disclosed gastric retention in 63 of 162 patients (39%).
In 181 (98%) of the patients the mBMI was 600 or more, and in 4 (2%) it was below 600.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with delayed gastric emptying.

variants.segregation_data: The Val30Met mutation is prevalent among FAP patients.
variants.additional_notes: The study primarily focused on the Val30Met mutation, with other mutations mentioned but not detailed.
key_quotes: Practically all patients carried the Val30Met mutation except 6 who carried the Leu55Gln, Phe33Leu, Tyr69His, His88Arg, Gly57Arg, and Val30Leu mutations.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only the Val30Met variant was extracted as it was the primary focus of the study.
